mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_UPLOAD_IMAGE (IMAGE_NAME, STORED_IMAGE_NAME, CATEGORY_CODE, FOREIGN_NO) VALUES(#{imageName}, #{storedFileName}, #{categoryCode}, #{foreignNo})
mapper.select: SELECT IMAGE_NO AS imageNo, IMAGE_NAME AS imageName, STORED_IMAGE_NAME AS storedFileName, CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode, FOREIGN_NO AS foreignNo FROM TB_UPLOAD_IMAGE WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode} AND FOREIGN_NO = #{foreignNo} ORDER BY IMAGE_NO ASC
SELECT IMAGE_NO AS imageNo, IMAGE_NAME AS imageName, STORED_IMAGE_NAME AS storedFileName, CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode, FOREIGN_NO AS foreignNo FROM TB_UPLOAD_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_NO = #{imageNo}
